content: WARNING:ChargeItem Search Parameter factor-override : number type illegal for ChargeItem.factorOverride : decimal (decimal)
Apparently because no-one's ever done it before. You need to add decimal=number to fhir.ini in the search-rules section.
Thanks! I thought it was me holding the spec upside down :)
That's generallly only a problem for Grahame. Everything's upside down over there ;)
